text: Thomas Kurzhals (13 December 1953 - 2 January 2014) was a German keyboardist, composer and musician. He was best known as a member of the rock bands Stern- Combo Mei√üen and Karat. He was born in Ronneburg, Thuringia, East Germany. Kurzhals died from liver cirrhosis on 2 January 2014 in Glauchau, Saxony. He was 60 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1953 births Category:2014 deaths Category:20th-century German composers Category:Keyboardists Category:People from Thuringia Category:Rock musicians Category:21st-century German composers
title: Thomas Kurzhals
